definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)

sentences.english: Smerdis and his forces were defeated by the Persians under Darius I.
sentences.chinese: 士马特斯和他的军队被大流士一世领导下的波斯打败。

sentences.english: South part of Yangze river has a great cultural connotations in the mind of the history of Chinese Shi people.
sentences.chinese: 江南，在中国士心灵史上蕴含丰富的文化内涵。

sentences.english: This is called special power, here is an Ace, I only have to rub it lightly.
sentences.chinese: 呢啲就叫特异功能，呢度有只A士，只要我轻轻一搓。

sentences.english: Reasoning Villa have been great at home and recorded a victory over Chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 阿士东维拉的主场成绩不俗，战胜过车路士。

sentences.english: Technology, Lector, Master, Research area: Embeded System and Information Process Technology.
sentences.chinese: 士，主要从事嵌入式系统开发和信息处理系统研究。

sentences.english: Treat them with forms of propriety they like, reward them with what they love, then those you seek will come.
sentences.chinese: 士喜爱赏就用赏相示，这样，所求的人就会来到。

sentences.english: That is what we emphasize at RadiSys, the art of the know how.
sentences.chinese: 这也是在瑞德士我们一直强调的“如何做”的艺术。

sentences.english: Reviewers see this as one of the best music search engines in existence.
sentences.chinese: 乐评人士认为这是现有最好的音乐搜索引擎。

sentences.english: You get a master in theology, and you get certified in Islamic chaplaincy.
sentences.chinese: 你能拿到神学的硕士，还能得做到伊斯兰教士的资格。

sentences.english: He's shown enough class for a champion chess player.
sentences.chinese: 他展现了一流西洋棋士的卓越技艺。

sentences.english: Thus, in the garb of a yogini , from place to place I shall wander.
sentences.chinese: 从而，在瑜伽士的装扮下，我将会到各个地方去漫游。

sentences.english: In past centuries, Brahmins have been the primary practitioners of Jyotish.
sentences.chinese: 在已往数世纪，婆罗门是首要的周谛士在业者。

sentences.english: The casualties included a young Israeli-American rabbi and his wife.
sentences.chinese: 遇难者包括一名以色列裔美国犹太教士和他的妻子。

sentences.english: But cardio is just the beginning of how far a fighter will go to get that edge.
sentences.chinese: 但是心肺训练只是格斗士超越极限的开胃菜。

sentences.english: Purity is an idea for the yogi or the monk.
sentences.chinese: 纯洁是属于瑜伽士或修道士的观念。

sentences.english: And departing from Cades, they camped in mount Her, in the uttermost borders of the land of Edom.
sentences.chinese: 由卡德士起程，在位于厄东地边界上的曷尔山下扎营。

definition: soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
